Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Wellington
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett: due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Northbound Reroute near Pulaski/26th
ShortDescription: Northbound 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Ogden, Kostner, 26st and Pulaski due to fire department activity near Pulaski/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Ogden, Kostner, 26st and Pulaski due to fire department activity near Pulaski/26th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #157 Streeterville Reroute at Western/Taylor
ShortDescription: 157 Streeterville buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, Harrison, Damen, and Polk, due to police activity near Western/Taylor.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#157 Streeterville buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Harrison, Damen, and Polk, due to police activity near Western/Taylor.

Allow extra travel time.
